answers.answer: My test was 1.40
It is legit because if you don't have diabetes your levels will be perfect and not affected at all, if its high its cause you have gestational diabetes but not because if the drink
The whole point is to test you to see how your body reacts to it. They test it an hour after for that purpose. And your not supposed to eat before.

Not all women's sugar levels are high though after they test you. After you drink the drink,  you wait an hour, some women's go back to normal. .. others stay elevated.That's why my dr has me fast for 12 hours.

It's necessary because gestational diabetes is very dangerous and sometimes a woman will have no symptoms. Doctors wouldn't recommend all women take it if it weren't important for your health during pregnancy.
I had eaten bread in the morning, just surprised that the Ob/gynecologic didn't advice me not to take something. It was not as high but he said I must go back. To me however I Find it weird.

Oh and on top no one in our family history has had diabetes, so I will go for the fasting test then will i know my true status. ; ) but I am positive I am not, since I keep a healthy diet. I just think the drink was too sugary. Oh and I didn't vomit it. ; )
you arnt suppose to eat anything before your appointment for the diabetes. that's why they say you need to be fasting. you should tell your doctor you ate before you went and they can redue it.
the drinks are nasty though and gave me a headache
Gestational diabetes is caused by hormonal changes in your body even if you eat healthy and exercise you can still have it during pregnancy. I'm not sure if it is genetic.
It doesnt matter if there is no history of diabetes in your family this is gestational diabetes.doesnt matter if you eat healthy or not some women get it even though they.eat healthy

Yeah, I think that's where tthey messed up. I ate in morning and then added that sugar. . Haha i just don't love hospitals,  now i have to go back.  Actually I have hated sugar since i was little, i don't eat sweets at all. Well if i was to have a problem i thought low sugar.

I fasted for 12 hrs and mine were still elevated but only by 4 points. I took the 3 hr test 2 days ago and I still have a headache... I probably have gestational diabetes. I'm waiting on the doctor to call me back.
Waoh, i see. Thanks girl's, it wasn't very alarming so i will go back now and i was told to fast that night. :)
Yes make sure you dont eat

Yup. Fasting for 12hrs gives you the clearest possible reading. They dont measure a spike of sugar in you. They measure if your body is evenly distributing it through your body over a specified period of time. After a certain period of time based on your previous blood pressure they can tell roughly how diluted the sugar should come back when they read your blood and thats how they know. Good luck momma.

Not all drs have you fast before the one hour test, mine doesn't, and to he honest if your sugar is gonna stay high it will whether you eat beforehand or not. Many drs actually recommend you eat as you normally would beforehand.

The reason they say not to eat is bc different foods can absorb the liquid rather than have your body process it properly. They do it for convenience. Other drs dont care but it does give the best answer about what your body does with sugar 100% on its own (without the influence of other stomach occupation).
Thanks ladies. :)

Ppl you do not need to fast for the glucose test. You shouldn't easy cinnamon iced huny buns and expect to pasS haha but you don't fat few doctors make you fast it's not necessary. If you don't pass it is bc you have gd. Not nc they overloaded you on sugar which I think is fn stupid and unhealthy to start with but that's the way to test. If you fail after the hour it's bc your body is not functioning correctly and controlling your sugar hence gd. Before test avoid starches bread, pastas etc, juice, and anything sugary. Then you should pas unless you do have gd. That is what my nurse practitioner told me to do as my next appt I will be doing my test. Last pregnancy I failed 1 hr bc I ate at olive garden and are a bunch of carbs. Passed my 3 hr test though. Lol

question: My argument is, if you measure my sugar level after giving me a highly concentrated sugar drink what do you expect? It will surely be high; adding the fact that I had took bread and mike as my breaskfast. I wish they just evaluated you without giving you that cup! Well I didn't vomit but still to me it's a not legit.
title: I think Drs. are wrong on the Sugar Test!
